description: "The illustration on this map highlights the wealth of the Asian trade routes, with merchants wearing colourful and elaborate robes presenting valuable treasures to a royal figure. A monkey, tortoise and camel emphasise the 'exoticism' of Asia."
title: "Exactissima Asiæ delineatio : in præcipuas regiones cæterasqs partes divisa et denuo in lucem edita / per Carolum Allard Amstelo-Batavum ;  extracta ex authenticis tabulis D. Nicolai Witsen, cos. Amst. et precipuorum auctorum, cum consensu viri amplissimi ; Ph. Tiedeman delin. ; G. v. Gouwen sculp."
